original_text: As he loved cursing, so let it come unto him: as he delighted not in blessing, so let it be far from him.
korean_text: 그가 저주하기를 좋아하더니 그것이 자기에게 임하고 축복하기를 기뻐하지 아니하더니 복이 그를 멀리 떠났으며

sentences.original_text: so let it come unto him:
as he delighted not in blessing,
so let it be far from him.
